paper_title.ja: 日本経済再生への道 (上杉信敬先生退職記念号)

description.ja: The purpose of this paper is to sbow the solution to Japanese economic recovery. First we should make a new tax called saving tax. Then we should spend the tax revenue to social security and education.

paper_title.ja: 医療・介護産業とマクロ経済(2)
paper_title.en: Healthcare industry and macro economy (2)

description.ja: We showed the followings in this paper. The labor supply in the healthcare industry and goods industry and nominal GDP and real GDP will increase if the sales price of healthcare increases and/ or purchase price of healthcare decreases.

paper_title.ja: 医療・介護産業とマクロ経済
paper_title.en: Healthcare industry and macro economy

description.ja: We showed the followings in this paper. The labor supply in the healthcare industry will increase if the sales price of healthcare increases. Nominal GDP will increase if the sales price of healthcare increases and/or the purchase price of healthcare decreases.

paper_title.ja: バブルのマクロ経済学
paper_title.en: A macroeconomic model with bubble economy

paper_title.ja: 長期マクロ経済モデル
paper_title.en: The macroeconomic model in the long run

description.ja: The purpose of this paper is to present a new macroeconomic model. In this model goods market, deposit market, loan market and bond market are considered. In the short run price and GDY are determined at the intersection of AD curve and AS curve. The long-term equilibrium is accomplished by the shift of AD curve. But under certain conditions GDP and price diverge.

paper_title.ja: 財市場,預金市場,貸付市場,国債市場を考慮したマクロ経済モデル
paper_title.en: A macroeconomic model considering deposit market, credit market, bond market and price fluctuation

description.ja: I present a new simple macroeconomic model, in which bond yield is determined at first and loan rate and real GDP are determined simultaneously. When GDP is determined, prices are determined at the same time, using AS curve. And deposit rate is determined last.

paper_title.ja: 総需要・総供給分析再考
paper_title.en: Aggregate supply-and-demand analysis reconsidered

description.ja: In usual macroeconomic textbooks prices and real GDP are determined at the intersection of AD curve with AS curve. And in the long run AS curve shifts and long-term equilibrium is accomplished. At that point full employment is achieved. I think that the analysis cannot explain the real economic situationl. I will present another macroeconomic model. In the model the long-term equilibrium is accomplished by the shift of AD curve. And unemployment exists at that point.

paper_title.ja: 物価,GDP,預金利子率,貸付利子率,国債利子率の決定を論じた簡単なマクロ経済モデル
paper_title.en: A simple macroeconomic model which analyses goods, deposit, loan and bond market

description.ja: The purpose of this paper is to make a simple macroeconomic model which deal with goods market, deposit market, loan market, and bond market. Price is determined in goods market, deposit rate is determined in deposit market, loan rate is determined in loan market and bond yield is determined in bond market. Although this model analyzes 4 markets, it is simple and the analysis is made by graphs.

paper_title.ja: 総需要曲線の問題点と新しい導出法について
paper_title.en: On the way to derive a true aggregate demand curve

description.ja: Usually in macroecomics AD curve is derived from IS curve and LM curve. But there are many problems in that way. I propose another way and show investment increases when price increase. And there is a possibility of plural equilibrium in goods market.

paper_title.ja: 預金市場,貸付市場,国債市場を考慮したマクロ経済モデル
paper_title.en: A macroeconomic model including deposit market, credit market and bond market

description.ja: IS-LM model is usually used in macroeconomic analysis. But LM Curve is difficult to understand intuitively. In the real world the loan rate determine the investment and bond yield determine the demand for money. But IS-LM model uses the only one interest rate. That confuses us. I present a new macroeconomic model, in which bond yield is determined at first and deposit rate and loan rate are determined simultaneously. GDP is determined last.

other_title.ja: １．金融市場のモデル分析を中心に進める。
家計の行動のなかの消費と労働供給について、また企業の行動の生産、価格決定、投資決定については一応のモデル化ができた。現在家計と企業の金融面の行動について研究中。
